projects.title: AtomMail
projects.description: An intelligent email management system with AI-powered categorization and summarization
details: Built the frontend using Flutter to provide an intuitive and responsive email management interface
Integrated the Gmail API to retrieve emails and categorized them using LangChain and a PostgreSQL database
Developed a Flask backend leveraging LangChain for email summarization and generating replies using simple English prompts

projects.title: Bird Drone Classifier
projects.description: An AI-powered image classification system with mobile app integration
details: Built a Flask backend for classifying 500+ images per hour, achieving 95% accuracy
Engineered a React Native app for real-time image uploads and instant classification results
Leveraged Cloudinary to handle image storage and optimization, cutting load times by 30%

projects.title: Event Hub
projects.description: A comprehensive event management Android application
details: Developed an event management app with user authentication, event creation, and friend invitations
Implemented Firebase Authentication, managing 1,000+ daily sign-ins securely
Optimized UI performance with RecyclerView and Glide, reducing image loading times by 40%
